name: digitallegacy-nft-marketplace
description: A modern NFT marketplace for digital creators

scripts.install:all: npm run install:frontend && npm run install:backend
scripts.test:all: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.deploy:contracts: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy:sepolia: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network sepolia
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd backend && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network mainnet

author: DigitalLegacy Team
